actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for purposes of making certain grants under the Indian Elementary and Secondary Assistance Act, the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1955, and the Adult Education Act.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for fiscal year 1977 of $150,000 under the Indian Elementary and Secondary School Assistance Act, $1,200,000 under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, and $632,000 under the Adult Education Act for the continuation of specified grants authorized under those Acts.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for purposes of making certain grants under the Indian Elementary and Secondary Assistance Act, the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1955, and the Adult Education Act.
